content: *from sweaterbabe * quite possibly one of the quickest projects on earth make a single bat or make a colony of them or make a bat mobile ha ha ha perfect for halloween favors or just for decorating glue them onto hair clips clothes pins or make a game of pin the bat on the cave or something cleverer than that by attaching velcro on the back… it s entirely up to you a great pattern to use up random scraps of black yarn use worsted yarn as shown here to get bats approximately 3 ¾ wide or use any sport yarn on hand with a size e hook to get smaller bats or use a bulky yarn and size k hook to get bigger bats etc etc… you get the idea **finished measurements ** each bat has a wingspan of 3 ¾ and measures 2 ½ from head to butt but crochet the bat with any scrap yarn and appropriate hook for the yarn and get different sizes
